post_message: UPDATE: AP reports Kim Davis, the Kentucky clerk who won't issue marriage licences, and all her deputy clerks have been called to appear at a federal court hearing on Thursday morning.   County Clerk Kim Davis eventually came out of her office, but she said she would not issue any marriage licences.  "Under whose authority?" she was asked. "Under God's authority," she said.
